channel.title: 30gig ipod video or 1 and a half gig ram and gfx card?
channel.description:
Ok so i have £150
What do you guys think i should get?
30gig ipod video from ebay, i wont use it loads but i will use it often for a while
or
1 and a half gig ram and a new gfx card.
i have on my pc atm:
nvidia geforce 2 intergrated gfx 512 ram 1gig processor (actualy is 2 gig but old hp pc so it says its 1gig)

item.title: 30gig ipod video or 1 and a half gig ram and gfx card?

item.description:
@shadow_hearts wrote:

Hell, the rams better then the i-pod…
my oppinion.

Read full topic

item.title: 30gig ipod video or 1 and a half gig ram and gfx card?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

James, did you just say you can’t get a graphic card when you have integrated graphics? No offence but that was pretty damn stupid. You just install the card to your pc in either the pci or agp slot, install the drivers, and then your good to go. Oh and then your monitor has to be plugged into the card as well.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Thebeanie, post:4, topic:39376”]i hear that the battery lifes crap, 2 hours for videos.[br][size=1]Posted on: December 25, 2006, 10:30:13 PM[/size][hr][quote author=mrrules link=topic=55342.msg685346#msg685346 date=1167125345]
IPOD!!

IPODS dont suck mp3’s suck…I jsut got a ipod

EDIT: 25!! for 512 it’s fricken 50 for 256!!!BULL SHIT I SAY
[/quote]

Im in the uk dude…

oh and i build pcs so i think i know the price.[/quote]

You “build” pc’s but you fail to know that it is not 1gig for a processor its 1ghz.[br][size=1]Posted on: December 26, 2006, 04:56:31 PM[/size][hr]Anyway, You will need to check if theres no APG slot. If there is no APG slot then you will need to buy a pci slot.
